pizzerias.name: La Toscana
pizzerias.specialty: Pizza Hawaii (sauce tomate, mozzarella, jambon, ananas frais, origan)
pizzerias.description: Family-owned Italian restaurant serving authentic wood-fired pizzas since 1998. Their Hawaiian pizza uses fresh pineapple rather than canned for a superior flavor.

pizzerias.name: Pizzeria Bella Italia
pizzerias.specialty: Tropicale (sauce tomate, mozzarella, jambon cuit, ananas, basilic frais)
pizzerias.description: Traditional pizzeria near the train station serving a variety of Italian classics. Their Hawaiian pizza comes with fresh basil to add an aromatic element to the sweet-savory combination.

pizzerias.name: Le Napoli
pizzerias.specialty: Exotique (sauce tomate, mozzarella, jambon, ananas, poivrons, olives)
pizzerias.description: Pizzeria in the heart of Grenoble's historic center. Their 'Exotic' pizza adds bell peppers and olives to the traditional Hawaiian combo for extra Mediterranean flavor.
